meaningMnemonic: The kanji means <kanji>hand</kanji>, and the word means <vocabulary>hand</vocabulary> too! It can also be used to refer to your whole <vocabulary>arm</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: Since this word is made up of a single kanji, it uses the kun'yomi reading. Since this is a body part, the kun'yomi reading usually takes priority. That means you learned the kun'yomi reading already when you learned the kanji.
